Summary Have expertise in SAP-ABAP as a consultant with dedicated and pragmatic experience in utility sector too.Also excellent skills in coding of ABAP/4 programs and extensive debugging of ABAP code.

•Have worked on LSM Workbench and implementation using Smart forms. 
 
•Functional knowledge of Warehouse Management and Logistics. 
 
•Techno-Functional knowledge of IS-U Master Data Model Specialties:Module Pool Programming,ALE-IDOCS and BADI.
